text: Lisa Ponomar (born 21 May 1997) is a German tennis player. She has a career- high singles ranking of No. 630, achieved on 21 May 2018. On 23 October 2017, she peaked at No. 328 in the doubles rankings. Ponomar made her WTA main-draw debut at the 2018 Dubai Tennis Championships in the doubles draw, partnering Eden Silva. ==ITF finals== ===Singles: 4 (2 titles, 2 runner–ups)=== {| |- valign=top | {|class=wikitable style="font-size:85%" |- !
